entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of snow this morning and early this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
